Este es uno de los mejores videojuegos que han podido aparecer en mi vida, a parte de un cierto valor sentimental que le doy personalmente, es un juego totalmente original y por el cual estoy gastando el tiempo para hacer esta reseña, pudiendo concluir con el comentario de que es una obra maestra que necesitas jugar antes de que pierdas la oportunidad.

Story, graphics, enemies, characters, music, and everything else is purely legendary. An essential piece in gaming history no one will ever forget.

Fun

I had played this game right after playing Source, and I remember stepping off the subway and being amazed at the graphics, and then later I learned that the Half-Life 2 graphics were considered revolutionary for there time, so I can say that the graphics still hold up. The game as fantastic game design with many different kinds of situations that are unique and extremely fun. I also found the story to be very engaging as well with it having many twists and turns. I don't really have anything negative to say about this game. I think that of a list of games that can be considered to be objectively masterpieces, this would be very high on that list.

10 out of 10

Yıl 2021 olacak ama bu oyun hala beni kendine aşık etmeye devam ediyor. Mükemmel diyemeyiz ama full grafiklerde kesinlike outdated hissetirmeyecek bir oyun. Fizik olarak bakıldığında zaten laf edemeyeceğimiz bir oyun. Zamanında süper leş ötesi bilgisayarımda crackli bitirmiştim, şimdi dönüp biraz daha gelişmiş oyun zevkimle bakıp biraz düşündüğümde bu oyunun kesinlike favorim olduğuna karar verdim. 10/10

Half Life 2...What I can say about one of the title that changed the world of FPS forever....Well, to be honest, it's not really exact, the game that has changed for first the world of the FPS forever is his predecessor Half Life, release on November 1998, oh my God, what a day that day I had installed this game and played for the first time, it was something that no one has ever attempted to do, it was mindblowing at the time, and Half Life 2 has amplified that sensation, 6 years later, on November 2004. This game is stil mindblowing today, after 16 years almost, yeah...there is someone saying "Half Life series it's overrated and bla bla", seriously, everytime I hear that I want to throw something out of the window, you cannot like Half LIfe, Half Life 2, tastes are tastes it's ok, but you cannot say it's shit just because you don't like the genre, Half Life series has defined how games have evolved in the following years, you like it or not, so please shut up, if you say bullshit like that it only shows how much you don't understand about games, go back and play that shit of Fortnite, it suits you better. This game has defined a generation, if you didn't play it yet do it now...You cannot call yourself a serious PC gamer if you've never played Half Life....Ah one more, it's useless criticizing a 16 years old game for the dated graphics, you cannot expect 2020 graphics from such an old game, so please stop to say it's dated because you only look stupid...Thank you.
